name: Visitors in the Park
description:
People have been vanishing from Bitterridge Park at night. Conspiracy theorists rumoured aliens visit every night to prey on unaccompanied children. Pages have been left behind by those who have allegedly seen them and survived.

Tonight, the kids from the town dared you to gather all eight pages to learn the secrets to surviving...

--

Play our first-ever game built in Unity by Gavin and Thomas! The game takes a lot of inspiration from the original Slenderman games but with an alien twist to it. The game is still a work in progress but we are both very happy in the state it is in.

--

Download and run the executable file (.exe) found in the folder. You may have to unzip it! Thank you for playing! 

Gavin & Thomas
